more than enough: an abundant supply of food There is abundant evidence that cars have a harmful effect on the environment. Cheap consumer goods are abundant (= exist in large amounts) in this part of the world. Synonyms
ample (ENOUGH)
plentiful
rich (HAVING A LOT OF STH)
